flowery.translation[0].definitions[0].de: decorated with a pattern of flowers
flowery.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a flowery place has a lot of flowers growing in it
flowery.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a flowery smell or taste is strong and sweet, like flowers
flowery.translation[0].definitions[3].de: flowery speech or writing uses complicated and rare words instead of simple clear language
